content: {A大笑}Is this the planet you're taking care of, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, baa? It smells so nice... the fresh scent of nature.
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-第一次对话-NPC不是回归NPC-12绵朵_特殊反馈

content: The meadow is as floofalicious as my hair~! I want to weave it into my dreams tonight. I'll go tidy up. See you in a bit.
